metadata.title: CVE-2021-47596 on Ubuntu 23.10 (mantic) - medium
metadata.description: In the Linux kernel, the following vulnerability has been resolved:net: hns3: fix use-after-free bug in hclgevf_send_mbx_msgCurrently, the hns3_remove function firstly uninstall client instance,and then uninstall acceletion engine device. The netdevice is freed inclient instance uninstall process, but acceletion engine device uninstallprocess still use it to trace runtime information. This causes a use afterfree problem.So fixes it by check the instance register state to avoid use after free.
